title: What makes Taylor Swift’s songs great? - Quora

response.answer_text: Taylor Swift’s hit songs share Similar experiences. The way she shares deep emotionally felt memories. I’ll need to do more research but, I love the way when she enters a room, “speak now” JetBlue stage for example, She doesn’t simply walks onto a stage. She glides in nearly floats towards the stage. I also love the way she moves her hands as she sings from the wrists using her fingers to tune her emotional vocal notes. It may be her vocals, only… I’d have to split he components vocal, music, motion to determine one or all three. All her songs are stories, therapy, or life experiences. Her songs are great because they transmute negative emotions into something positive and are personal to each listener. Had a man protected her from the beginning of her career she would have ruled the musical world from the start.

I think its the fact that she really makes her songs actual stories of peoples lives and it's incredibly real down to earth and relatable and it makes us feel like we’re not alone, helps us to sort out our feelings and helps us know what to do in similar situations. it helps us feel things we may not get to feel when we put ourselves into her songs in her perspective. she makes them even better by making them insanely catchy with beautiful melodies and crazy good production that has us driving around screaming in the car at midnight and simultaneously sobbing along with a Slurpee
